name: Your Last Xmas
summary: The house formerly belonged to a singer who had some success in the 1980s as part of a duo, singing about tropical holidays and whatnot, before going solo and achieving greater success with his newfound freedom. There were always the rumors however - that he may have been connected a series of gruesome cannibalistic murders. He passed away a few years back, but some say he returns every December 25th - and Last Christmas, he ate people's hearts...
